member.name: T:DevToys.PocoDB.Core.Operations.DbCommandOperation`1
member.summary:
Class for executing NonQuery or Scalar sql statements. Parameters are parsed by DbCommandOperation decorated with DBCommandAttribute and DBParameterAttribute attributes.
Note: Initialization occurs on each first call after object creation, in case of multiple execution declare on class level.
member.typeparam: Object defining Procedure Call with or without parameters

member.param: Points to ConnectionString Configuration in section DevToys.PocoDB in App.Config

member.param: Use in memory created configuration instead of using App.Config declaration.

member.param: Points to ConnectionString Configuration in section DevToys.PocoDB in App.Config

member.summary: When CommandOperation does not have any parameters

member.name: T:DevToys.PocoDB.Core.Operations.DbCommandOperation`2
member.summary:
Class for executing Reader or SingleReader procedures. Parameters are parsed by DbCommandOperation decorated with DBCommandAttribute and DBParameterAttribute attributes. ResultValues are based on TObject decorated with DBTableAttribute and DBFieldAttribute attributes.
Note: Initialization occurs on each first call after object creation, in case of multiple execution declare on class level.
member.typeparam: The Result Object Type either as enumarable or single object.
Object defining Procedure Call with or without parameters

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoDB.Core.Operations.DbCommandOperation`2.#ctor(System.String)
member.param: Reference to connection in DevToys.PocoDB config section

member.param: Points to ConnectionString Configuration in section DevToys.PocoDB in App.Config

member.summary: For procedures without any parameters.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoDB.Core.Operations.DbCommandOperation`2.ExecuteReader(`1)
member.summary: Exexutes a procedure, parameters are specified by DbCommandOperation object marked with DBCommandAttribute and DBParameterAttributes returns TObject, TObject must be marked with DBFieldAttributes and must match the procedure result.
member.param: Reference to attribute's commandName.

member.name: M:DevToys.PocoDB.Core.Operations.DbCommandOperation`2.ExecuteSingleReader(`1)
member.summary: Exexutes a procedure, parameters are specified by DbCommandOperation object marked with DBCommandAttribute and DBParameterAttributes returns TObject, TObject must be marked with DBFieldAttributes and must match the procedure result.

member.name: T:DevToys.PocoDB.Core.Operations.DynamicSqlOperation
member.summary:
Class for executing sql statements and mapping them to dynamic ExpandoObjects. All property names will be cleaned from non letters. underscores are kept, spaces changed to underscore!.
Limitations: - Output Parameters cannot be retrieved from procedures.

member.param: Points to ConnectionString Configuration in section DevToys.PocoDB in App.Config

dynamic parameters will be translated to DbParameter
